menu.title: Griddle Cakes
menu.desc: Celebrate breakfast with our artisanal griddle cakes—fluffy, golden perfection served with maple syrup and powdered sugar. It's a blissful morning treat.

menu.title: Twin Tower Burger
menu.desc: Indulge in our Twin Tower Burger—a delicious duo of juicy beef patties, cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes between toasted buns. A satisfying delight for burger enthusiasts.

menu.title: Chocozilla Milkshake
menu.desc: Enjoy our Chocozilla Milkshake—rich cocoa and creamy ice cream topped with whipped cream, chocolate syrup, and shavings. A true delight for chocolate lovers.

menu.title: Mystery bonaptit
menu.desc: Start your day with our Mystery Breakfast Plate—a delicious surprise of flavors and textures to tantalize your taste buds and fuel your morning.

menu.title: Eggsplosion Burger
menu.desc: The Eggsplosion Burger—bursting with flavors, featuring a juicy patty topped with a perfectly cooked egg. A delightful explosion of taste in every bite.

menu.title: Nocturnal Delight
menu.desc: Savor our Nocturnal Delight—a creamy blend of cookies and cream, perfect for indulging in the rich flavors of midnight magic.

menu.title: Bacon Cascade
menu.desc: Dive into the Bacon Cascade—where crispy, savory bacon takes the spotlight, flooding your taste buds with irresistible flavor in every bite.

menu.title: Basic Burger
menu.desc: Introducing our Classic Burger—juicy beef patty, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and tangy pickles on soft buns. A timeless favorite for burger enthusiasts.

menu.title: You're single
menu.desc: Presenting our 'You're Single' XL Milkshake—an extravagant blend of creamy flavors, topped with whipped cream and sprinkles. Treat yourself to this sweet indulgence.

menu.title: Veggized Bison
menu.desc: Try our Veggie Bison Steak—savor the rich flavors of lean bison paired perfectly with fresh garden vegetables. A hearty and wholesome dish for a satisfying meal.
